#set terminal postscript eps enhanced
set terminal postscript enhanced color 
set output 'step-horizontal.eps'
set size 0.9, 0.9
set grid
set key outside
set size square
set xlabel 'horizontal velocity u_x'
set ylabel 'y-coordinate'
plot [-0.2 : 1.8][0:2] '-' u ($1-6):2 w l linetype 1 linecolor 1 linewidth 2 title 'Present study (x/h = 6)' ,  '-' w p pointtype 5 linecolor 1 pointsize 0.8 title 'Erturk (x/h = 6)', '-' u ($1-14):2 w l linetype 1 linecolor 2 linewidth 2 title 'Present study (x/h = 14)' ,  '-' w p pointtype 5 linecolor 2 pointsize 0.8 title 'Erturk (x/h = 14)', '-' u ($1-30):2 w l linetype 1 linecolor 3 linewidth 2 title 'Present study (x/h = 30)' ,  '-' w p pointtype 5 linecolor 3 pointsize 0.8 title 'Erturk (x/h = 30)'
